result.html: D'éalaigh sé as príosúnHe escaped from prison.
result.ponchtml: D'éalaiġ sé as príosúnHe escaped from prison.

result.eng: For those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ga: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.orig: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.html: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaighFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ an ṁaise don dream a d'éalaiġFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
